Title: The Plague Dogs.
Subtitle: A Novel.
Authors: Richard Adams.

Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=H2SPDQAAQBAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: A large black mongrel named Rowf and a white terrier named Snitter escape from an animal experiment center in England's Lake District and, aided by a cunning fox, learn to live on their own, until rumors of slaughtered sheep and bubonic plague-carrying dogs transform them into fugitives.
